{{title|1=operator==,!={{small|(std::istream_iterator&lt;T, CharT, Traits, Dist&gt;)}}}}
{{cpp/iterator/istream_iterator/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|iterator}}
{{dcl|num=1|1=
template&lt; class T, class CharT, class Traits, class Dist &gt;
bool operator==( const std::istream_iterator&lt;T, CharT, Traits, Dist&gt;&amp; lhs,
                 const std::istream_iterator&lt;T, CharT, Traits, Dist&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|until=c++20|1=
template&lt; class T, class CharT, class Traits, class Dist &gt;
bool operator!=( const std::istream_iterator&lt;T, CharT, Traits, Dist&gt;&amp; lhs,
                 const std::istream_iterator&lt;T, CharT, Traits, Dist&gt;&amp; rhs );
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=c++20|1=
friend bool operator==( const istream_iterator&amp; i, std::default_sentinel_t );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks whether both {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} are equal. Two stream iterators are equal if both of them are end-of-stream iterators or both of them refer to the same stream.

@1@ Checks whether {{c|lhs}} is ''equal to'' {{c|rhs}}.

@2@ Checks whether {{c|lhs}} is ''not equal to'' {{c|rhs}}.

@3@ Checks whether {{c|lhs}} is an end-of-stream iterator.&lt;br&gt;{{cpp/hidden friend|std::istream_iterator&lt;T, CharT, Traits, Dist&gt;}}

{{rrev|since=c++20|
{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|stream iterators to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|true}} if {{c|lhs}} is ''equal to'' {{c|rhs}}, {{c|false}} otherwise.

@2@ {{c|true}} if {{c|lhs}} is ''not equal to'' {{c|rhs}}, {{c|false}} otherwise.

@3@ {{c|true}} if {{c|lhs}} is an end-of-stream iterator, {{c|false}} otherwise.

{{cpp/impldef exception}}
